articles.author: Auzinea Bacon
articles.title: Trump announces tariffs of 30% on Mexico and the European Union - CNN
articles.description: President Donald Trump released two tariff letters on Saturday, imposing duties of 30% on products from Mexico and the European Union.
articles.content: President Donald Trump on Saturday threatened duties of 30% on products from Mexico and the European Union, two of Americas biggest trading partners, in an ongoing tariff campaign thats upended globa… [+5453 chars]
